Package gameObjects.characters

Class Player

java.lang.Object
gameObjects.GameObject
gameObjects.characters.Entity
gameObjects.characters.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameLogic
public class Player
extends Entity
player class that is used to create a player that has the ability to move around the game .
Author:
bradl

  • Method Details

    • getCollisionResolution

      public CollisionResolution getCollisionResolution()
      Gets the variable "CollisionResolution". This collision resolution will send the player into a battle screen via FightState. It first will call the object create fighters to create the fighters for the battle.
      Overrides:
      getCollisionResolution in class GameObject
      Returns:
      collision resolution - CollisionResolution
